thread.title: BRIEF-Nanoxplore Announces Bought Deal Private Placement of About $8 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Nanoxplore Announces Bought Deal Private Placement of About $8 Mln
text: March 5, 2018 / 8:41 PM / Updated 26 minutes ago BRIEF-Nanoxplore Announces Bought Deal Private Placement of About $8 Mln Reuters Staff March 5 (Reuters) - Nanoxplore Inc: * NANOXPLORE INC ANNOUNCES BOUGHT DEAL PRIVATE PLACEMENT * ENTERED INTO DEAL WITH UNDERWRITERS FOR BOUGHT DEAL PRIVATE PLACEMENT OFFERING OF UNITS AT $1.65 PER UNIT FOR ABOUT $8 MILLION * ‍INTENDS TO USE NET PROCEEDS OF OFFERING FOR ACQUISITIONS, FUNDING FOR DEVELOPMENT OF 10,000 TONNE PER YEAR GRAPHENE PRODUCTION PLANT​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
